item.title: Motherhood, May, and Mary
item.description: These words I heard from my husband on the evening we made the sweetest discovery… of our little baby’s life, slowly growing inside me. Those first weeks were something of a surreal wonder at the miracle of Creation, but there was also a vague, hardly distinguishable anxiety. The enormous gift we had been entrusted with at the same time appeared so fragile and uncertain. And yet we knew beyond doubt that our child’s life had begun, a new soul had been fashioned, from then on to exist eternally.
